author: hwright
msg: Run wc-ng transactions using SAVEPOINTS rather than TRANSACTIONS.  This
should allow nesting of the various wc-ng APIs, allowing each to handle its
own transaction, rather than worrying about inner or outer ones.
Use svn_sqlite__with_lock() in place of svn_sqlite__with_transaction().

author: jukka
msg: TIKA-597: Bogus exception handler in org.apache.tika.parser.mail.MailContentHandler.body(BodyDescriptor, InputStream)
Use MimeException instead of RuntimeException for passing Tika- and SAXExceptions up the call chain.
